channel.title: Data Structure on The Quiescent Current
channel.description: Recent content in Data Structure on The Quiescent Current

item.title: The Red-Black Tree
item.description: C++ Source Code D Source Code D provides a number of features that simplify designing software, especially in the embedded environment. I will show in this 2 part comparison, between C++ and D, that D helps one write correct code. Correct code is something Andrei Alexandrescu, stresses heavily as a prominent feature of D. I use the Red-Black Tree for such a comparison since its complicated enough to make memory management difficult, while retaining real-world application.
